notes: The dictionary is based on Lithuanian-Latvian dictionary (1995) by Jons Balkevičs, Laimute Balode, Apolonija Bojāte, Valters Subatnieks, ed. by Alberts Sarkanis. It contains ca. 60 00 lexical entries, inclusion of morphlogical analysis tools allows search for word forms.
